meanings.definition: A procedure in which liquid or gas is injected into the rectum to expel its contents.
meanings.sent1: The nurse administered an enema to help the patient with constipation.
meanings.sent2: The doctor recommended an enema to cleanse the colon before the procedure.
meanings.sent3: The enema bag looked like a strange water balloon.
meanings.sent4: After the enema, the patient felt as if a weight had been lifted off their shoulders.
meanings.sent5: The enema solution flowed through the tube like a gentle river.

meanings.definition: The liquid or gas injected in such a procedure.
meanings.sent1: The enema solution was carefully prepared by the medical team.
meanings.sent2: The nurse disposed of the used enema bag in the proper waste bin.
meanings.sent3: The enema liquid bubbled like a fizzy drink.
meanings.sent4: The smell of the enema lingered in the room long after the procedure.
meanings.sent5: The enema liquid glistened under the bright hospital lights.
